name: Password Generator
description: This application creates random passwords for convenience and security. It is responsive to screens of all sizes.

name: Sundial Day Planner
description: This application helps to organize tasks and appointments throughout the workday. It is currently set up for desktop and similar sized screens.

name: Weather Dashboard
description: This aplication checks the current weather and five day forecast for a selected city. It is responsive to a screen of any size.

name: Fitness Tracker
description: This application helps to track your customized workouts with a display history.
technologies: HTML, CSS, Express, MongoDB, Mongoose Schema, MVC Format

name: Budget Tracker
description: This application allows you to keep track of your finances quickly and easily.
technologies: HTML, CSS, Express, MongoDB MVC Format. Incorporates manifest.json and service-worker.js

name: Passage
description: This is a web application that allows the user to search for National Parks, Monuments, Trails and Historic Sites to explore.
technologies: MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js, CSS, host of npm dependencies.
